Apache Kid.name: Apache Kid
Apache Kid.ability: Cards of Diamonds played by other players do not affect him.

Belle Star.name: Belle Star
Belle Star.ability: During her turn, cards in play in front of other players have no effect.

Bill Noface.name: Bill Noface
Bill Noface.ability: He draws 1 card, plus 1 card for each wound he has.

Chuck Wengam.name: Chuck Wengam
Chuck Wengam.ability: During his turn, he may choose to lose 1 life point to draw 2 cards.

Claus The Saint.name: Claus The Saint
Claus The Saint.ability: He draws one more card than the number of players, keeps 2 for himself, then gives 1 to each player.

Doc Hollyday.name: Doc Hollyday
Doc Hollyday.ability: During his turn, he may discard 2 cards from the hand to shoot a Bang.

Elena Fuente.name: Elena Fuente
Elena Fuente.ability: She may use any card as a Missed.

Greg Digger.name: Greg Digger
Greg Digger.ability: Each time another player is eliminated, he regains 2 life points.

Herb Hunter.name: Herb Hunter
Herb Hunter.ability: Each time another player is eliminated, he draws 2 extra cards.

Johnny Kisch.name: Johnny Kisch
Johnny Kisch.ability: Each time he puts a card into play, all other cards in play with the same name are discarded.

Jose Delgado.name: Jose Delgado
Jose Delgado.ability: Twice in his turn, he may discard a blue card from the hand to draw 2 cards.

Molly Stark.name: Molly Stark
Molly Stark.ability: Each time she uses a card from her hand out of turn, she draws a card.

Pat Brennan.name: Pat Brennan
Pat Brennan.ability: He may draw only one card in play in front of any one player.

Sean Mallory.name: Sean Mallory
Sean Mallory.ability: He may hold in his hand up to 10 cards.

Tequila Joe.name: Tequila Joe
Tequila Joe.ability: Each time he plays a Beer, he regains 2 life points instead of 1.

Uncle Will.name: Uncle Will
Uncle Will.ability: Once during his turn, he may play any card from hand as a General Store.
